Package server.net

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.net.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class holds the server socket and handles all connections from clients by creating a threaded client handler object called "Connection", also keeps track of all connections in a list.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(int portNumber)
        Creates a server socket bound to a specified port and a list of connected players, then starts listener thread. Also instantiates a serverPing object.

        Because the listener needs to be threaded, the .start() of this class will be called in the constructor.

        Parameters:
        portNumber - specifies port number to be opened for the server socket

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is always listening for connections onto the server socket, creates object of it and adds them to the list of connected players followed by calling the run() method of a newly created object.

        This is achieved by a loop with a blocking method. At the beginning of the loop, server.accept() blocks the thread until a new connection is established onto the server socket, unblocking the thread and adding the new connection to the list of connections. From there, the loop begins again.

        The newly created object can also be called a client handler, as the object processes the new connection in a new thread.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • readHighscore

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readHighscore()
        Method to read Highscore.txt
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList containing all lines from Highscore.txt

      • createHighscore

        public static void createHighscore()
        Method to create the correct path to our Highscore.
